divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving down highway 407 with my parents and I looked out at the sky. It is near Pearson airport, so I saw some aircraft. I also saw some birds flying away from a point. I saw a large, hovering, metallic object. It made no audible noise and hovered until it was out of site.
Summary: Driving down a highway with my parents when I see a strange metallic object hovering in a cloudless sky.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Oakville
There were no other sightings in Oakville on or around October 8th 2011
